tool_description: Inplay Bet365 with events/score/markets/odds/ev_link. Update every second!
name: Bet365 API Inplay
title: Bet365 API Inplay

api_list.name: List of Leagues
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://bet365-api-inplay.p.rapidapi.com/bet365/get_leagues"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bet365-api-inplay.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Event Markets with Odds
api_list.description: Get all inplay event markets with latest odds by "EventId" or "MarketFI" parameter.

api_list.name: Inplay Sport Events
api_list.description: Get all events by "sport" parameter: soccer, tennis, basketball, icehockey, volleyball, baseball, esports
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://bet365-api-inplay.p.rapidapi.com/bet365/get_sport_events/soccer"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bet365-api-inplay.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
